about_the_game:
The Orphan is a Hidden Object Game with emotional story of Sarah, the orphan girl who mysteriously disappeared with her family. Player as Sarah’s cousin, who has lost his memory, has to find out the clues with the help of an unknown spirit while saving yourself from another ghost in the abandoned house. You have to unravel the mystery of Sarah and her family’s disappearance and escape from the errant ghost.



Key Features:

• Exciting Storyline
• Solve Mind Blowing Puzzles
• Find Clues about Disappearance of Sarah
• Use Hints to Find Objects
• 14 Supported Languages

The game is filled with amazing hidden object scenes and exciting puzzles to solve. Collect clues within the creepy, haunted house and find your way out. Follow the storyline to know more about Sarah and her poor faith. Is it a Tragedy or a Conspiracy?
